segments.text: Wow ! So many students crowded in . More than I excepted , we are lucky to arrive in hour earlier . Or else we definedly have problems to getting good seats .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I learned my lesson from the last experience . I didn't arrive early enough . So I ended up with a terrible seat , All the way up in the front row . It was one of my worst movie experiences ever .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I hate sitting in the front row .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: By the way , it was really thoughtful if you to get me the ticket . I really appreciate it , I'll buy some popcorn , and drinks for us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll be back as soon as possible . Oh , I almost forgot I'd better hold on to my ticket stop in case of they let me in .
segments.speaker: S2
